name: lightningtalk-circle-static-theme
description: Lightning Talk Circle - Static HTML Theme for Events

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run build:assets
scripts.minify:html: html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true -o dist/index.html index.html && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true -o dist/registration-form.html registration-form.html

author: Lightning Talk Team
